reviews.text: The 鸡蛋仔 is not crispy this time. Very soft. Not toasted long enough. They used to be crispy and delicious.

It is located within cow play cow moo at level 3 of northshore plaza 2 so do take note of it. As it is new, you cant find it via the mall directory kiosk too. There is no seating area so its take and go. Will be back again to grab a drink when am at cpcm too.
The staff was very friendly and helpful. I order the new season drink which is green grape tea it wan great and refreshing. Must try
I came at 13.00 and wait for so long until 13.30, nobody take order

Was there on Sunday, waited for more than 30mins as the staff go for toilet break. Understandable as only 1 staff is working on a busy Sunday evening. Somehow, her attitude is not acceptable. No greeting like other outlets never mind. I asked if she accepted cash. As I'm afraid it is a cashless payment mode. Here is the reply from her, “how much u gonna pay?” I haven't even ordered and I don't even know how much my orders cost. Followed by, a frustrating mood if you going to pay $50 I have no changes for you-.-! Then I said okay, I can pay by paywave or smaller changes. She then *rolled her eyes*! Omg! This kind of service can meh? After that, I tried to order, and she replied wait! I still have an order that needs to be keyed in. Jolly Well has to wait right? She takes her own sweet time to key in all the orders-.- while my kids and I discuss what to order. She said again! Wait! I got orders-.-! Hello! I'm just discussing with my kids not ordering. Does she need to be so frustrated? Worst experience.
